original_title: Crónica de una ciudad que fue
overview: A virtual reality experience that leads syou on a tour of Bogota, Colombia's most traditional district as it was in the 1940s. Your travels through these iconic streets are paired with narration of seven works written by "Ximenez" (1915-1946), one of the pioneers of the "red crónica." A journey through a vanished city.
title: Crónica de una ciudad que fue
